label: Bathroom and Kitchen Dispensers
description: Products that dispense soap, shampoo, lotion, and other liquids in bathrooms and kitchens.
intents: Find stylish dispensers for home decor

subcategories.label: Soap Dispensers
subcategories.description: Dispensers for liquid hand soap, dish soap, and shower gel.

subcategories.label: Shampoo and Conditioner Dispensers
subcategories.description: Dispensers for shampoo, conditioner, and other hair care products.

subcategories.label: Lotion Dispensers
subcategories.description: Dispensers for hand lotion, body lotion, and other moisturizers.

subcategories.label: Other Liquid Dispensers
subcategories.description: Dispensers for other liquids, such as mouthwash, sanitizer, and cleaning products.
